item.title: Movie and TV Idea Theft Lawsuits Are on the Rise. Very Few Prevail In Court
item.description: The producers behind popcorn thriller ‘G20’ were sued on Wednesday for copyright infringement. There’s been an uptick in accusations of infringement in recent years, though that hasn’t led to much suc
